column4: Hello, can someone help me get yum working in ubuntu? I already did "apt-get install yum" but it doesn't see any packages.  Thanks :)
yum is not the package management program for ubuntu
then why does it let me install yum? i can do yum --help fine, it just doesnt see any packages
maybe some respositries need to be added? sorry,not really knowledgeable about it
